%%[ SET @brandColor = TreatAsContent('{{mcpm:brandColor}}') ]%%
%%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') SET @subscriberKey = _subscriberkey SET @isFormSubmitted = REQUESTPARAMETER('formSubmitted') SET @displayMessage = '' SET @updateSuccess = 'false' SET @updateSuccessMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onPreferenceUpdateSuccess') SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = 'false' SET @fullErrorMsg = '' IF @subscriberKey == "" THEN SET @subscriberKey = RequestParameter("s") ENDIF SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') SET @batchId = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') SET @globalUnsubscribeUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/oa50ykrsmh5?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @globalOptOutConfirmationUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/iotp4bzrnxx?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Preferences from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingPreferencesRowSet = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( "Marketing_Preference__c", "ID, Name, Frequency__c, Description__c", "isActive__c", "=", "TRUE", "MID__c", "=", @mid ) /************* Retrieve Subscriber Opt Out Status from CRM ***************/ SET @contactRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Contact', 'Id, HasOptedOutOfEmail, Email, FirstName', 'Id', '=', @subscriberKey ) IF ROWCOUNT(@contactRowset) > 0 THEN SET @firstName = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'FirstName') SET @emailAddress = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'Email') SET @isGloballyUnsubscribed = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'HasOptedOutOfEmail') IF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == "True" THEN SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "Checked" ELSE SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "" ENDIF ENDIF IF @isFormSubmitted == 'true' THEN /******************* START: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ SET @globalOptOutSelection = REQUESTPARAMETER('subscriberGlobalOptOut') SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false /* Check is LogUnsubEvent API call successful */ SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false /* Checks if unsubscribe from All Subs is successful, default to true if LogUnsubEvent API successful */ IF @globalOptOutSelection == 'optedOut' THEN /* global unsubscribe selected, process request directly */ REDIRECT(@globalUnsubscribeUrl) ELSE FOR @k = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @currentMarketingPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @k), 'Id') SET @currentSubscriptionPrefId = REQUESTPARAMETER(@currentMarketingPrefId) IF NOT EMPTY(@currentSubscriptionPrefId) THEN /* marketing preference is selected (checked) */ IF @currentSubscriptionPrefId == 'default' THEN /* No current Subscriber Preference record -> create one with optedin = true */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-in sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* update existing subscriber preference record for @currentSubscriptionPrefId to opted in */ SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @currentSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to true sub pref ', @currentSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ELSE /* Marketing preference is not selected (checked) OR does not have corresponding subscription preference record. When subscription preference record does not exist, we do NOT create one with opt-in = false */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @currentMarketingPrefId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* update existing subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @existingSubscriptionPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @existingSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to false sub pref ', @existingSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* create new subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-out sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF NEXT @k SET @updateSuccess = 'true' ENDIF /******************* END: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ ELSEIF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == 'True' THEN /* display globally opted out message */ Redirect(@globalOptOutConfirmationUrl) ELSE ]%%

Hey %%=v(@firstName)=%%, manage the emails you receive from us. Select from the following options:

(FYI, we're sending emails to this address: %%=v(@emailAddress)=%%)

%%[ /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Id') SET @marketingPreferenceName = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Name') SET @marketingPreferenceDesc = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Description__c') SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @marketingPreferenceId /******* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference *******/ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Subscriber Preference exists -> display as is */ SET @subscriberPrefOptInStatus = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'OptedIn__c') SET @subscriberPreferenceId = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @subscriberPreferenceId*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = @subscriberPreferenceId IF @subscriberPrefOptInStatus == "True" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ELSE /* Subscriber Preference doesn't exist -> set Marketing Pref Id to create new subscriber pref with default consent upon submit of form */ /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = Concat(@marketingPreferenceId, '_default')*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = 'default' IF @defaultConsentStatus == "true" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ENDIF ]%%

%%[ NEXT @i ]%%

%%[ ELSE SET @displayMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onZeroMarketingPreferences') ENDIF ENDIF SET @displayMessage = @fullErrorMsg IF @errorFlag == 'true' THEN CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", @fullErrorMsg ) ENDIF ]%%

%%=v(@displayMessage)=%%

%%[ IF @errorFlag == 'false' AND @updateSuccess == 'true' THEN ]%%

%%=v(@updateSuccessMessage)=%%

Return to Preference Center %%[ ENDIF ]%%

%%[ SET @brandColor = TreatAsContent('{{mcpm:brandColor}}') ]%%

Email Preference Center

%%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') SET @subscriberKey = _subscriberkey SET @isFormSubmitted = REQUESTPARAMETER('formSubmitted') SET @displayMessage = '' SET @updateSuccess = 'false' SET @updateSuccessMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onPreferenceUpdateSuccess') SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = 'false' SET @fullErrorMsg = '' IF @subscriberKey == "" THEN SET @subscriberKey = RequestParameter("s") ENDIF SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') SET @batchId = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') SET @globalUnsubscribeUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/oa50ykrsmh5?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @globalOptOutConfirmationUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/iotp4bzrnxx?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Preferences from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingPreferencesRowSet = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( "Marketing_Preference__c", "ID, Name, Frequency__c, Description__c", "isActive__c", "=", "TRUE", "MID__c", "=", @mid ) /************* Retrieve Subscriber Opt Out Status from CRM ***************/ SET @contactRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Contact', 'Id, HasOptedOutOfEmail, Email, FirstName', 'Id', '=', @subscriberKey ) IF ROWCOUNT(@contactRowset) > 0 THEN SET @firstName = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'FirstName') SET @emailAddress = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'Email') SET @isGloballyUnsubscribed = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'HasOptedOutOfEmail') IF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == "True" THEN SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "Checked" ELSE SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "" ENDIF ENDIF IF @isFormSubmitted == 'true' THEN /******************* START: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ SET @globalOptOutSelection = REQUESTPARAMETER('subscriberGlobalOptOut') SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false /* Check is LogUnsubEvent API call successful */ SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false /* Checks if unsubscribe from All Subs is successful, default to true if LogUnsubEvent API successful */ IF @globalOptOutSelection == 'optedOut' THEN /* global unsubscribe selected, process request directly */ REDIRECT(@globalUnsubscribeUrl) ELSE FOR @k = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @currentMarketingPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @k), 'Id') SET @currentSubscriptionPrefId = REQUESTPARAMETER(@currentMarketingPrefId) IF NOT EMPTY(@currentSubscriptionPrefId) THEN /* marketing preference is selected (checked) */ IF @currentSubscriptionPrefId == 'default' THEN /* No current Subscriber Preference record -> create one with optedin = true */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-in sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* update existing subscriber preference record for @currentSubscriptionPrefId to opted in */ SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @currentSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to true sub pref ', @currentSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ELSE /* Marketing preference is not selected (checked) OR does not have corresponding subscription preference record. When subscription preference record does not exist, we do NOT create one with opt-in = false */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @currentMarketingPrefId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* update existing subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @existingSubscriptionPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @existingSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to false sub pref ', @existingSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* create new subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-out sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF NEXT @k SET @updateSuccess = 'true' ENDIF /******************* END: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ ELSEIF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == 'True' THEN /* display globally opted out message */ Redirect(@globalOptOutConfirmationUrl) ELSE ]%%

Hey %%=v(@firstName)=%%, manage the emails you receive from us. Select from the following options:

(FYI, we're sending emails to this address: %%=v(@emailAddress)=%%)

%%[ /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Id') SET @marketingPreferenceName = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Name') SET @marketingPreferenceDesc = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Description__c') SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @marketingPreferenceId /******* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference *******/ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Subscriber Preference exists -> display as is */ SET @subscriberPrefOptInStatus = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'OptedIn__c') SET @subscriberPreferenceId = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @subscriberPreferenceId*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = @subscriberPreferenceId IF @subscriberPrefOptInStatus == "True" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ELSE /* Subscriber Preference doesn't exist -> set Marketing Pref Id to create new subscriber pref with default consent upon submit of form */ /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = Concat(@marketingPreferenceId, '_default')*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = 'default' IF @defaultConsentStatus == "true" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ENDIF ]%%

%%[ NEXT @i ]%%

%%[ ELSE SET @displayMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onZeroMarketingPreferences') ENDIF ENDIF SET @displayMessage = @fullErrorMsg IF @errorFlag == 'true' THEN CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", @fullErrorMsg ) ENDIF ]%%

%%=v(@displayMessage)=%%

%%[ IF @errorFlag == 'false' AND @updateSuccess == 'true' THEN ]%%

%%=v(@updateSuccessMessage)=%%

Return to Preference Center %%[ ENDIF ]%%

efunetmr676.content: %%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') /* %%memberid%% personalization string*/ SET @subscriberKey = REQUESTPARAMETER('s') /* %%_subscriberkey%% personalization string */ SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = false SET @fullErrorMsg = 'Resubscribe flow: ' SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') /* %%jobid%% personalization string - only available via email footer*/ SET @batchid = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') /* %%_JobSubscriberBatchID%% personalization string - only available via email footer */ SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF EMPTY(@subscriberKey) THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Missing Subscriber Key. ') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Resubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Resubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /* Set HasOptedOut to false, Set Email Out Source to 'Preference Center'*/ SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'false', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /************* START: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ELSE /* No Subscriber Preference record exists for this Marketing Preference -> create one with default status */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @marketingPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ENDIF NEXT @i ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /********************* START: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Active") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onResubscribeSuccess') Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error reactivating subscriber status in All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* TODO: how should resubscribe failure be handled? */ ENDIF /********************* END: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF ENDIF ]%%

content.html: %%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') /* %%memberid%% personalization string*/ SET @subscriberKey = REQUESTPARAMETER('s') /* %%_subscriberkey%% personalization string */ SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = false SET @fullErrorMsg = 'Resubscribe flow: ' SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') /* %%jobid%% personalization string - only available via email footer*/ SET @batchid = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') /* %%_JobSubscriberBatchID%% personalization string - only available via email footer */ SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF EMPTY(@subscriberKey) THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Missing Subscriber Key. ') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Resubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Resubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /* Set HasOptedOut to false, Set Email Out Source to 'Preference Center'*/ SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'false', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /************* START: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ELSE /* No Subscriber Preference record exists for this Marketing Preference -> create one with default status */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @marketingPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ENDIF NEXT @i ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /********************* START: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Active") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onResubscribeSuccess') Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error reactivating subscriber status in All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* TODO: how should resubscribe failure be handled? */ ENDIF /********************* END: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF ENDIF ]%%
content.name: Resubscribe Flow

76mau07p0c6.content: %%[ /* TODO: create @errorFlag and set it to true when any part of the following steps fails Instead of logging multiple error log records for each error, concat error messages to a variable at each failure point and after all processing, check @errorFlag status, if == true, then create a single Error Log message in CRM with the full concatenated error message */ SET @errorFlag = false SET @fullErrorMsg = 'Globl Unsubscribe flow: ' SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') /* %%memberid%% personalization string*/ SET @subscriberKey = REQUESTPARAMETER('s') /* %%_subscriberkey%% personalization string */ SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false /* Check if LogUnsubEvent API call successful */ SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false /* Checks if unsubscribe from All Subs is successful, default to true if LogUnsubEvent API successful */ SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') /* %%jobid%% personalization string - only available via email footer*/ SET @batchid = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') /* %%_JobSubscriberBatchID%% personalization string - only available via email footer */ SET @globalUnsubConfirmationUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/iotp4bzrnxx?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) IF EMPTY(@subscriberKey) THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Missing Subscriber Key. ') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Globl Unsubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /************* Set Email Opt Out and Opt Out Date on Contact CRM ***************/ SET @today = FormatDate(Now(), "iso") SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'true', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') /* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! */ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF /************* START: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) ENDIF NEXT @i /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /************************** START: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ IF NOT EMPTY(@jobId) THEN SET @listid = @allSubscribersListId /*all subs id*/ SET @reason = "Preference Center" SET @lue = CreateObject("ExecuteRequest") SetObjectProperty(@lue,"Name","LogUnsubEvent") SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "SubscriberKey") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @subscriberKey) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "JobID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @jobId) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "ListID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @listid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) IF NOT EMPTY(@batchid) THEN SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "BatchID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @batchid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) ENDIF SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "Reason") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @reason) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_statusCode = InvokeExecute(@lue, @overallStatus, @requestId) SET @Response = Row(@lue_statusCode, 1) SET @Status = Field(@Response,"StatusMessage") SET @Error = Field(@Response,"ErrorCode") IF (@Error == '12012') OR (@Error == '401') OR (@Status == 'Event posted') THEN /* Succeeded */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = true SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE /* Failed */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'LogUnSub Event error for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /************************** END: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ /********************* START: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call **************************** */ IF EMPTY(@jobId) OR @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess == false THEN /* Job Id not available or LogUnsubEvent failed - perform unsubscribe without logunsub */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Unsubscribed") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onUnsubscribeSuccess') SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error unsubscribing from All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /********************* END: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call ****************************** */ ENDIF ]%%

html.content:
%%[ SET @brandColor = TreatAsContent('{{mcpm:brandColor}}') ]%%
%%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') SET @subscriberKey = _subscriberkey SET @isFormSubmitted = REQUESTPARAMETER('formSubmitted') SET @displayMessage = '' SET @updateSuccess = 'false' SET @updateSuccessMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onPreferenceUpdateSuccess') SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = 'false' SET @fullErrorMsg = '' IF @subscriberKey == "" THEN SET @subscriberKey = RequestParameter("s") ENDIF SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') SET @batchId = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') SET @globalUnsubscribeUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/oa50ykrsmh5?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @globalOptOutConfirmationUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/iotp4bzrnxx?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&b=', @batchId, '&j=', @jobId ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Preferences from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingPreferencesRowSet = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( "Marketing_Preference__c", "ID, Name, Frequency__c, Description__c", "isActive__c", "=", "TRUE", "MID__c", "=", @mid ) /************* Retrieve Subscriber Opt Out Status from CRM ***************/ SET @contactRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Contact', 'Id, HasOptedOutOfEmail, Email, FirstName', 'Id', '=', @subscriberKey ) IF ROWCOUNT(@contactRowset) > 0 THEN SET @firstName = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'FirstName') SET @emailAddress = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'Email') SET @isGloballyUnsubscribed = FIELD(ROW(@contactRowset, 1), 'HasOptedOutOfEmail') IF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == "True" THEN SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "Checked" ELSE SET @subscriberGlobalOptOut = "" ENDIF ENDIF IF @isFormSubmitted == 'true' THEN /******************* START: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ SET @globalOptOutSelection = REQUESTPARAMETER('subscriberGlobalOptOut') SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false /* Check is LogUnsubEvent API call successful */ SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false /* Checks if unsubscribe from All Subs is successful, default to true if LogUnsubEvent API successful */ IF @globalOptOutSelection == 'optedOut' THEN /* global unsubscribe selected, process request directly */ REDIRECT(@globalUnsubscribeUrl) ELSE FOR @k = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @currentMarketingPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @k), 'Id') SET @currentSubscriptionPrefId = REQUESTPARAMETER(@currentMarketingPrefId) IF NOT EMPTY(@currentSubscriptionPrefId) THEN /* marketing preference is selected (checked) */ IF @currentSubscriptionPrefId == 'default' THEN /* No current Subscriber Preference record -> create one with optedin = true */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-in sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* update existing subscriber preference record for @currentSubscriptionPrefId to opted in */ SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @currentSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'true' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to true sub pref ', @currentSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ELSE /* Marketing preference is not selected (checked) OR does not have corresponding subscription preference record. When subscription preference record does not exist, we do NOT create one with opt-in = false */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @currentMarketingPrefId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* update existing subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @existingSubscriptionPrefId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @existingSubscriptionPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF @subPreferenceUpdateResult == 0 THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error updating to false sub pref ', @existingSubscriptionPrefId) ENDIF ELSE /* create new subscriber preference record for @existingSubscriptionPrefId to opted out */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @currentMarketingPrefId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) IF EMPTY(@subPreferenceId) THEN SET @errorFlag = 'true' SET @displayMessage = Concat(@displayMessage, ' Error creating opted-out sub pref for marketing pref', @currentMarketingPrefId) ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF NEXT @k SET @updateSuccess = 'true' ENDIF /******************* END: Process Form Submission ****************************** */ ELSEIF @isGloballyUnsubscribed == 'True' THEN /* display globally opted out message */ Redirect(@globalOptOutConfirmationUrl) ELSE ]%%

Hey %%=v(@firstName)=%%, manage the emails you receive from us. Select from the following options:

(FYI, we're sending emails to this address: %%=v(@emailAddress)=%%)

%%[ /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferencesRowSet) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Id') SET @marketingPreferenceName = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Name') SET @marketingPreferenceDesc = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferencesRowSet, @i), 'Description__c') SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @marketingPreferenceId /******* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference *******/ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Subscriber Preference exists -> display as is */ SET @subscriberPrefOptInStatus = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'OptedIn__c') SET @subscriberPreferenceId = Field(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = @subscriberPreferenceId*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = @subscriberPreferenceId IF @subscriberPrefOptInStatus == "True" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ELSE /* Subscriber Preference doesn't exist -> set Marketing Pref Id to create new subscriber pref with default consent upon submit of form */ /*SET @subscriberPrefUniqueAttribute = Concat(@marketingPreferenceId, '_default')*/ SET @subscriberPrefValue = 'default' IF @defaultConsentStatus == "true" THEN SET @Switch = "Checked" ELSE SET @Switch = "" ENDIF ENDIF ]%%

%%[ NEXT @i ]%%

%%[ ELSE SET @displayMessage = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onZeroMarketingPreferences') ENDIF ENDIF SET @displayMessage = @fullErrorMsg IF @errorFlag == 'true' THEN CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", @fullErrorMsg ) ENDIF ]%%

%%=v(@displayMessage)=%%

%%[ IF @errorFlag == 'false' AND @updateSuccess == 'true' THEN ]%%

%%=v(@updateSuccessMessage)=%%

Return to Preference Center %%[ ENDIF ]%%

efunetmr676.content: %%[ SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') /* %%memberid%% personalization string*/ SET @subscriberKey = REQUESTPARAMETER('s') /* %%_subscriberkey%% personalization string */ SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @errorFlag = false SET @fullErrorMsg = 'Resubscribe flow: ' SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') /* %%jobid%% personalization string - only available via email footer*/ SET @batchid = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') /* %%_JobSubscriberBatchID%% personalization string - only available via email footer */ SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') SET @defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'Default_Consent_Status__c') IF (@defaultConsentStatusPicklistValue == 'Opt-In') THEN SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'true' ELSE SET @defaultConsentStatus = 'false' ENDIF ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF IF EMPTY(@subscriberKey) THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Missing Subscriber Key. ') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Resubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Resubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /* Set HasOptedOut to false, Set Email Out Source to 'Preference Center'*/ SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'false', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /************* START: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ELSE /* No Subscriber Preference record exists for this Marketing Preference -> create one with default status */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @marketingPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ENDIF NEXT @i ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Resubscribe with default consent status to all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /********************* START: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Active") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onResubscribeSuccess') Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error reactivating subscriber status in All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* TODO: how should resubscribe failure be handled? */ ENDIF /********************* END: Activate Status in All Subs **************************** */ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF ENDIF ]%%

should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ELSE /* No Subscriber Preference record exists for this Marketing Preference -> create one with default status */ SET @subPreferenceId = CreateSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 3, 'Contact__c', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', @marketingPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', @defaultConsentStatus ) ENDIF NEXT @i ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') 76mau07p0c6.content: %%[ /* TODO: create @errorFlag and set it to true when any part of the following steps fails Instead of logging multiple error log records for each error, concat error messages to a variable at each failure point and after all processing, check @errorFlag status, if == true, then create a single Error Log message in CRM with the full concatenated error message */ SET @errorFlag = false SET @fullErrorMsg = 'Globl Unsubscribe flow: ' SET @mid = REQUESTPARAMETER('m') /* %%memberid%% personalization string*/ SET @subscriberKey = REQUESTPARAMETER('s') /* %%_subscriberkey%% personalization string */ SET @errorMessageText = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onError') SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false /* Check if LogUnsubEvent API call successful */ SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false /* Checks if unsubscribe from All Subs is successful, default to true if LogUnsubEvent API successful */ SET @jobId = REQUESTPARAMETER('j') /* %%jobid%% personalization string - only available via email footer*/ SET @batchid = REQUESTPARAMETER('b') /* %%_JobSubscriberBatchID%% personalization string - only available via email footer */ SET @globalUnsubConfirmationUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/iotp4bzrnxx?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) SET @preferenceCenterUrl = Concat( 'https://mc9n5fnx63vvn4svqn99mtsh-r34.pub.sfmc-content.com/lyzx0z41afi?s=', @subscriberKey, '&m=', @mid, '&j=', @jobId, '&b=', @batchid ) IF EMPTY(@subscriberKey) THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Missing Subscriber Key. ') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Globl Unsubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /************* Set Email Opt Out and Opt Out Date on Contact CRM ***************/ SET @today = FormatDate(Now(), "iso") SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'true', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') /* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! */ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF /************* START: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) ENDIF NEXT @i /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /************************** START: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ IF NOT EMPTY(@jobId) THEN SET @listid = @allSubscribersListId /*all subs id*/ SET @reason = "Preference Center" SET @lue = CreateObject("ExecuteRequest") SetObjectProperty(@lue,"Name","LogUnsubEvent") SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "SubscriberKey") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @subscriberKey) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "JobID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @jobId) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "ListID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @listid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) IF NOT EMPTY(@batchid) THEN SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "BatchID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @batchid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) ENDIF SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "Reason") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @reason) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_statusCode = InvokeExecute(@lue, @overallStatus, @requestId) SET @Response = Row(@lue_statusCode, 1) SET @Status = Field(@Response,"StatusMessage") SET @Error = Field(@Response,"ErrorCode") IF (@Error == '12012') OR (@Error == '401') OR (@Status == 'Event posted') THEN /* Succeeded */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = true SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE /* Failed */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'LogUnSub Event error for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /************************** END: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ /********************* START: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call **************************** */ IF EMPTY(@jobId) OR @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess == false THEN /* Job Id not available or LogUnsubEvent failed - perform unsubscribe without logunsub */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Unsubscribed") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onUnsubscribeSuccess') SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error unsubscribing from All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /********************* END: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call ****************************** */ ENDIF ]%%

') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", "Globl Unsubscribe flow: Missing Subscriber Key." ) */ ELSEIF (LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 15 AND LENGTH(@subscriberKey) != 18) OR SUBSTRING(@subscriberKey, 1, 3) != '003' THEN SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' is invalid.') /* CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 2, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey, " is invalid.") ) */ ELSE /************* Set Email Opt Out and Opt Out Date on Contact CRM ***************/ SET @today = FormatDate(Now(), "iso") SET @contactUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Contact', @subscriberKey, 'HasOptedOutOfEmail', 'true', 'Email_Opt_Out_Source__c', 'Preference Center' ) IF @contactUpdateResult == 1 THEN /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE /* Error updating Contact record - exit */ SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /*CreateSalesforceObject( "Error_Log__c", 3, "Contact__c", @subscriberKey, "Source__c", "Preference Center", "Message__c", CONCAT("Globl Unsubscribe flow: Error updating opt-out fields on Contact record for Subscriber Key ", @subscriberKey) )*/ ENDIF /************* Retrieve Marketing Settings from CRM ***************/ SET @marketingSettingsRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Settings__mdt', 'Default_Consent_Status__c, All_Subscribers_List_ID__c, DeveloperName', 'DeveloperName', '=', 'Hackathon2021_Preference_Mgmt' ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingSettingsRowset) > 0 THEN SET @allSubscribersListId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingSettingsRowset, 1), 'All_Subscribers_List_ID__c') /* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! */ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Settings from CRM.') ENDIF /************* START: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ SET @marketingPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Marketing_Preference__c', 'Id, isActive__c, MID__c', 'isActive__c', '=', 'true', 'MID__c', '=', @mid ) IF ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN FOR @i = 1 TO ROWCOUNT(@marketingPreferenceRowset) DO SET @marketingPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@marketingPreferenceRowset, @i), 'Id') /* Retrieve subscriber preference for current marketing preference */ SET @subscriberPreferenceRowset = RetrieveSalesforceObjects( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', 'Id, Contact__c, Marketing_Preference__c, OptedIn__c', 'Contact__c', '=', @subscriberKey, 'Marketing_Preference__c', '=', @marketingPreferenceId ) IF ROWCOUNT(@subscriberPreferenceRowset) > 0 THEN /* Retrieve subscriber preference ID - should only have one per marketing preference/ contact */ SET @subscriberPreferenceId = FIELD(ROW(@subscriberPreferenceRowset, 1), 'Id') SET @subPreferenceUpdateResult = UpdateSingleSalesforceObject( 'Subscriber_Preference__c', @subscriberPreferenceId, 'OptedIn__c', 'false' ) ENDIF NEXT @i /*!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!*/ ELSE SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error retrieving Marketing Preferences from CRM.') ENDIF /************* END: Unsubscribe from all Marketing Preferences for BU ***************/ /************************** START: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ IF NOT EMPTY(@jobId) THEN SET @listid = @allSubscribersListId /*all subs id*/ SET @reason = "Preference Center" SET @lue = CreateObject("ExecuteRequest") SetObjectProperty(@lue,"Name","LogUnsubEvent") SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "SubscriberKey") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @subscriberKey) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "JobID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @jobId) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "ListID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @listid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) IF NOT EMPTY(@batchid) THEN SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "BatchID") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @batchid) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) ENDIF SET @lue_prop = CreateObject("APIProperty") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Name", "Reason") SetObjectProperty(@lue_prop, "Value", @reason) AddObjectArrayItem(@lue, "Parameters", @lue_prop) SET @lue_statusCode = InvokeExecute(@lue, @overallStatus, @requestId) SET @Response = Row(@lue_statusCode, 1) SET @Status = Field(@Response,"StatusMessage") SET @Error = Field(@Response,"ErrorCode") IF (@Error == '12012') OR (@Error == '401') OR (@Status == 'Event posted') THEN /* Succeeded */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = true SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE /* Failed */ SET @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess = false SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'LogUnSub Event error for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /************************** END: LogUnsubEvent ***************************************** */ /********************* START: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call **************************** */ IF EMPTY(@jobId) OR @isLogUnsubUnsubSuccess == false THEN /* Job Id not available or LogUnsubEvent failed - perform unsubscribe without logunsub */ SET @subscriber = CreateObject("Subscriber") SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "SubscriberKey", @subscriberKey) SetObjectProperty(@subscriber, "Status", "Unsubscribed") SET @options = CreateObject("UpdateOptions") SET @save = CreateObject("SaveOption") SetObjectProperty(@save,"SaveAction","UpdateAdd") SetObjectProperty(@save,"PropertyName","*") AddObjectArrayItem(@options,"SaveOptions", @save) SET @status = InvokeUpdate(@subscriber, @errorMsg, @errorCode, @options) IF @status == 'OK' THEN SET @message = LOOKUP('MessageText', 'Content', 'Event', 'onUnsubscribeSuccess') SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = true /* Redirect to global unsub confirmation page */ Redirect(@globalUnsubConfirmationUrl) ELSE SET @isAllSubUnsubSuccess = false SET @errorFlag = true SET @fullErrorMsg = Concat(@fullErrorMsg, 'Error unsubscribing from All Subscribers list for Subscriber Key ', @subscriberKey, ' Error Code: ', @errorCode, ' Error Message: ', @errorMsg, '.') /* Redirect back to pref center with error appended to url */ Redirect(@preferenceCenterUrl) ENDIF ENDIF /********************* END: All Subs Unsubscribe API Call ****************************** */ ENDIF ]%%
content.name: Global Unsubsribe Flow
